ps.changeclassifier

Class ChangeDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ps.changeclassifier.ChangeDetector

  • public class ChangeDetector
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for change detection in a plain-text document. Uses google-diff-match-patch library (@see https://github.com/GerHobbelt/google-diff-match-patch for more information)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected static Change extendChange(Change c, java.lang.String text1, java.lang.String text2, int option) 
      static java.util.ArrayList<Change> getChanges(java.lang.String text1, java.lang.String text2)
      Calculate the shortest edit script.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getChanges

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Change> getChanges(java.lang.String text1,
                                                     java.lang.String text2)
        1. Calculate the shortest edit script.
        2. Cleanup the script to group some diffs.
        3. Assign diffs their positions in text.

        Parameters:
        text1 - Text before change.
        text2 - Text after change.
        Returns:
        A list of changes with their positions in text before and after changes made.
